Name: NAIR
About the game: A simple fighting game with one attack. NAIR is a fast-paced game that features deep, expressive ground movement typical of platform fighters and a strong, air-only attack with several applications. Every blow you land heals your character, for a unique tug-of-war health system that enables clutch comebacks. Practice your platform fighter fundamentals, or clown around in one of the silliest fighters to date. Features Online play using rollback netcode Near-universal controller support Wavedashing :) One (1) entire attack A dark theme for the weary-eyed Hitbox visualization
